title: The Village green

abstract: Visual poem on Vietnamese village life.
description: Vietnamese poet Huong Trieu worked with ACMI to produce a visual treatment of her poetry about village life in Vietnam.  This was part of a VicHealth funded initiative. Made at ACMI as part of the 'Recovering Hope' Digital Storytelling project, in partnership with VicHealth and Belgium Street Neighbourhood House.
